item.title: Considerations for Using Markdown Writing Apps on Static Sites
item.description: If you use a static site generator, you might find yourself writing a lot of Markdown. And the more you write it, the more you want the tooling experience to fade so the content takes focus.

item.title: Hugo Templates for WordPress Designers
item.description: Dive into the basics of the popular static site generator called Hugo by comparing it to its most well-known "dynamic" ancestor, WordPress.

item.title: Getting Started with Static Sites
item.description: You may have heard the buzz about so-called "static" websites. In this post we'll tell you what they are, what's the big deal, and what you need to know to build one.

item.title: HTML and CSS: Still Relevant for Designers
item.description: Knowing only HTML and CSS will still get you far as a designer, and can give you all the qualifications you need to meet the new bar for designers.
